verses.verse: Now [this is] the <S%H4557>enumeration<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of fathers' [households,] the <S%H8269>commanders<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> and of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> and their <S%H7860>officers<s%> who <S%H8334>served<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>affairs<s%> of the <S%H4256>divisions<s%> which <S%H935>came<s%> in and <S%H3318>went<s%> out <S%H2320>month<s%> by <S%H2320>month<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2320>months<s%> of the <S%H8141>year,<s%> <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H4256>division<s%> [numbering] 24000.

<S%H3434>Jashobeam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2068>Zabdiel<s%> had <S%H5921>charge<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4256>division<s%> for the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month;<s%> and in his <S%H4256>division<s%> [were] 24000.

[He was] from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez,<s%> [and was] <S%H7218>chief<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>commanders<s%> of the <S%H6635>army<s%> for the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>

<S%H1737>Dodai<s%> the <S%H266>Ahohite<s%> and his <S%H4256>division<s%> had <S%H5921>charge<s%> of the <S%H4256>division<s%> for the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> <S%H4732>Mikloth<s%> [being] the <S%H5057>chief<s%> <S%H5057>officer;<s%> and in his <S%H4256>division<s%> [were] 24000.

The <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H8269>commander<s%> of the <S%H6635>army<s%> for the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> [was] <S%H1141>Benaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> [as] <S%H7218>chief;<s%> and in his <S%H4256>division<s%> [were] 24000.

<S%H1931>This<s%> <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> [was] the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>man<s%> of the <S%H7970>thirty,<s%> and had <S%H5921>charge<s%> of <S%H7970>thirty;<s%> and over his <S%H4256>division<s%> was <S%H5990>Ammizabad<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

The <S%H7243>fourth<s%> for the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> [was] <S%H6214>Asahel<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> and <S%H2069>Zebadiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him; and in his <S%H4256>division<s%> [were] 24000.
The <S%H2549>fifth<s%> for the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> [was] the <S%H8269>commander<s%> <S%H8049>Shamhuth<s%> the <S%H3155>Izrahite;<s%> and in his <S%H4256>division<s%> [were] 24000.

The <S%H8345>sixth<s%> for the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> [was] <S%H5896>Ira<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6142>Ikkesh<s%> the <S%H8621>Tekoite;<s%> and in his <S%H4256>division<s%> [were] 24000.

The <S%H7637>seventh<s%> for the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> [was] <S%H2503>Helez<s%> the <S%H6397>Pelonite<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim;<s%> and in his <S%H4256>division<s%> [were] 24000.

The <S%H8066>eighth<s%> for the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> [was] <S%H5444>Sibbecai<s%> the <S%H2843>Hushathite<s%> of the <S%H2227>Zerahites;<s%> and in his <S%H4256>division<s%> [were] 24000.

The <S%H8671>ninth<s%> for the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> [was] <S%H44>Abiezer<s%> the <S%H6069>Anathothite<s%> of the <S%H1145>Benjamites;<s%> and in his <S%H4256>division<s%> [were] 24000.

The <S%H6224>tenth<s%> for the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> [was] <S%H4121>Maharai<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite<s%> of the <S%H2227>Zerahites;<s%> and in his <S%H4256>division<s%> [were] 24000.

The <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> for the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> [was] <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H6553>Pirathonite<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim;<s%> and in his <S%H4256>division<s%> [were] 24000.

The <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> for the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> [was] <S%H2469>Heldai<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite<s%> of <S%H6274>Othniel;<s%> and in his <S%H4256>division<s%> [were] 24000.

Now in <S%H5921>charge<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H5057>chief<s%> <S%H5057>officer<s%> for the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%> was <S%H461>Eliezer<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2147>Zichri;<s%> for the <S%H8099>Simeonites,<s%> <S%H8203>Shephatiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4601>Maacah;<s%>
for <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> <S%H2811>Hashabiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7055>Kemuel;<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H6659>Zadok;<s%>
for <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H453>Elihu,<s%> [one] of David's <S%H251>brothers;<s%> for <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> <S%H6018>Omri<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4317>Michael;<s%>
for <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> <S%H3460>Ishmaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5662>Obadiah;<s%> for <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H3406>Jeremoth<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5837>Azriel;<s%>

for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H1954>Hoshea<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5812>Azaziah;<s%> for the half-tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H3100>Joel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6305>Pedaiah;<s%>

for the half-tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> <S%H3035>Iddo<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2148>Zechariah;<s%> for <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H3300>Jaasiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H74>Abner;<s%>
for <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> <S%H5832>Azarel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> [were] the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

But <S%H1732>David<s%> did not <S%H5375>count<s%> <S%H4557><s%> those <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H1121>age<s%> and <S%H4295>under,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> He would <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

<S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> had <S%H2490>begun<s%> to <S%H4487>count<s%> [them,] but did not <S%H3615>finish;<s%> and because of <S%H2088>this,<s%> <S%H7110>wrath<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> upon <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the <S%H4557>number<s%> was not <S%H5927>included<s%> in the <S%H1697>account<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H1732>David.<s%>

Now <S%H5820>Azmaveth<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5717>Adiel<s%> had <S%H5921>charge<s%> of the king's <S%H214>storehouses.<s%> And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%> had <S%H5921>charge<s%> of the <S%H214>storehouses<s%> in the <S%H7704>country,<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities,<s%> in the <S%H3723>villages,<s%> and in the <S%H4026>towers.<s%>
And <S%H5836>Ezri<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3620>Chelub<s%> had <S%H5921>charge<s%> of the <S%H7704>agricultural<s%> <S%H4399>workers<s%> who <S%H5656>tilled<s%> the <S%H127>soil.<s%>

And <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> the <S%H7435>Ramathite<s%> had <S%H5921>charge<s%> of the <S%H3754>vineyards;<s%> and <S%H2067>Zabdi<s%> the <S%H8225>Shiphmite<s%> had <S%H5921>charge<s%> of the produce of the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> [stored] in the <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H214>cellars.<s%>

And Baal-hanan the <S%H1451>Gederite<s%> had <S%H5921>charge<s%> of the <S%H2132>olive<s%> and <S%H8256>sycamore<s%> <S%H8256>trees<s%> in the <S%H8219>Shephelah;<s%> and <S%H3135>Joash<s%> had <S%H5921>charge<s%> of the <S%H214>stores<s%> of <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

And <S%H7861>Shitrai<s%> the <S%H8290>Sharonite<s%> had <S%H5921>charge<s%> of the <S%H1241>cattle<s%> which were <S%H7462>grazing<s%> in <S%H8289>Sharon;<s%> and <S%H8202>Shaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5724>Adlai<s%> had <S%H5921>charge<s%> of the <S%H1241>cattle<s%> in the <S%H6010>valleys.<s%>

And <S%H179>Obil<s%> the <S%H3459>Ishmaelite<s%> had <S%H5921>charge<s%> of the <S%H1581>camels;<s%> and <S%H3165>Jehdeiah<s%> the <S%H4824>Meronothite<s%> had <S%H5921>charge<s%> of the <S%H860>donkeys.<s%>

And <S%H3151>Jaziz<s%> the <S%H1905>Hagrite<s%> had <S%H5921>charge<s%> of the <S%H6629>flocks.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> were <S%H8269>overseers<s%> of the <S%H7399>property<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> belonged to <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H1732>David.<s%>

Also <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> David's <S%H1730>uncle,<s%> [was] a <S%H3289>counselor,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H995>understanding,<s%> and a <S%H9373>scribe;<s%> and <S%H3171>Jehiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2453>Hachmoni<s%> <S%H5973>tutored<s%> the king's <S%H1121>sons.<s%>
And <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> was <S%H3289>counselor<s%> to the <S%H4428>king;<s%> and <S%H2365>Hushai<s%> the <S%H757>Archite<s%> was the king's <S%H7453>friend.<s%>

And <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1141>Benaiah,<s%> and <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> <S%H310>succeeded<s%> <S%H302>Ahithophel;<s%> and <S%H3097>Joab<s%> was the <S%H8269>commander<s%> of the king's <S%H6635>army.<s%>
